definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: I will give you thanks, for you answered me; you have become my salvation.
sentences.chinese: 我要称谢你，因为你已经应允我，又成了我的拯救。

sentences.english: 5 who by his understanding made the heavens, His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 称谢那用智慧造天的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
sentences.chinese: 你们义人当靠耶和华欢喜，称谢他可记念的圣名。

sentences.english: Give thanks to the God of heaven. His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 你们要称谢天上的神，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
sentences.chinese: 你们应当弹琴称谢耶和华，用十弦瑟歌颂他。

sentences.english: I will praise you, O Lord , among the nations; I will sing of you among the peoples.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，我要在万民中称谢你，在列邦中歌颂你。

sentences.english: 13 to him who divided the Red Sea asunder His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 称谢那分裂红海的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 你们要称谢天上的神，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 称谢那铺地在水以上的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: 7 who made the great lights- His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 称谢那造成大光的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever
sentences.chinese: 称谢那分裂红海的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 你们要称谢万神之神，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: I will praise you with an upright heart as I learn your righteous laws.
sentences.chinese: 我学了你公义的判语，就要以正直的心称谢你。

sentences.english: O Lord my God, I will give you thanks forever.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华我的神阿，我要称谢你，直到永远。

sentences.english: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 称谢那用智慧造天的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: Therefore will I give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and sing praises unto thy name.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，因此我要在外邦中称谢你，歌颂你的名。

definition: to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
to bow down low/to make obeisance/to kneel and bow
to bow with hands held in front
to thank sb for favor (esp. emperor or superior official)
to shed tears of gratitude (idiom); moved to tears
expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement
face light up with delight (idiom); to beam with joy
to bow respectfully with clasped hands/to beg humbly
